# Install 

```r
library("devtools")
install_github("geomdoner", "tlevine")
```

Windows users also must first install
[Rtools](http://cran.rstudio.com/bin/windows/Rtools/).
 
# Example

```{r dsamp}
library(geomdoner)
ggplot(mpg) +
  aes(label = paste(manufacturer, model), fill = trans, cilantro = TRUE, x = hwy, y = cty) +
  geom_text() + geom_taco()
```
